entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
